content: The Old Rattle-Drum is one of the more well-hidden Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong. However, it is one of the more important optional ones, as it unlocks a secret area, a hidden boss, and one of the Gourds in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum'.
The content is as follows:
The Old Rattle-Drum is one of the more well-hidden Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong. However, it is one of the more important optional ones, as it unlocks a secret area, a hidden boss, and one of the Gourds in the game.
